about_the_game:
Welcome to your first night on the job as a security officer at the prestigious Grand Falls Museum. You’re no stranger to late-night shifts, but tonight’s different. Just as you start your very first shift, a new exhibit arrives—one with a dark reputation and whispered tales of supernatural encounters. Locals claim it's haunted, but those are just stories...right?

As you patrol the silent halls and shadowed corners, strange things begin to happen. Unexplainable sounds, eerie movements in the darkness, and a sense that something sinister is watching. You soon realize that you’re not alone. The exhibits seem to come to life, twisting the familiar into horrifying nightmares. Each step tests your courage, each hour feels like an eternity, and surviving until morning might be more than just a job requirement.

Key Features:

• Immersive Exploration: Traverse detailed museum halls and discover exhibits that hold dark secrets. Each room and artifact has its own eerie backstory, adding depth to your experience.

• Dynamic Hauntings: Encounter paranormal events triggered by your actions and location. From unexplainable sounds to shadowy figures moving just out of sight, every encounter will keep you on edge.

• Survival Mechanics: Utilize your wits and limited resources to survive the night. With no traditional weapons, players must rely on stealth, quick thinking, and environmental cues to stay safe.

• Detailed Sound Design and Visuals: The game uses atmospheric soundscapes and realistic visuals to create an immersive experience. The creaks, whispers, and eerie silence amplify the fear factor as you explore.

Echoes of Horror: Museum is a first-person horror experience where exploration, atmosphere, and psychological tension are central. Your job is to survive the haunted museum’s eerie mysteries, but staying alive until morning will take more than just courage. Will you be able to withstand the horrors lurking within, or will you become yet another ghostly tale lost in the museum’s cursed history?
